nodes.text: The Ninth Sister utilized a double-bladed spinning lightsaber during her time as an Inquisitor of the Galactic Empire. She originally utilized a saber that was similar in design to the Grand Inquisitor's, the only difference being a spike was present on each side of the wheel. It was used by Darth Vader during a skirmish on Cabarria after his lightsaber was destroyed by an ion grenade.
At some point in between 18 BBY and 14 BBY, the Ninth Sister replaced her original saber with one that had a more robust hilt, a wider emitter and a thicker wheel.
The Aurebesh writing on the wheel of the Ninth Sister's lightsaber reads "ASDFGHJKLQWERTYUIOPZXCVBNMAASDFGHJKLQWERTYUIOPZXCVBNMASDFGHJKLQWERTYUIOPZXCVBNMASDFGHJKLQWERTYUIOPZXCVBNM".
